languages.text: "Первый параграф верования гласит: "Движущая сила есть жизнь". Коли я полнюсь ею, значит, я жив".
"The First Article of Faith says, 'The Motive Force is life.' Therefore, so long as it fills me, I am alive."
languages.original_text: "Первый параграф верования гласит: "Движущая сила есть жизнь". Коли я полнюсь ею, значит, я жив".

traits.locale_text: "The First Article of Faith says, 'The Motive Force is life.' Therefore, so long as it fills me, I am alive."
"The First Article of Faith says, 'The Motive Force is life.' Therefore, so long as it fills me, I am alive."
"The First Article of Faith says, 'The Motive Force is life.' Therefore, so long as it fills me, I am alive."
"The First Article of Faith says, 'The Motive Force is life.' Therefore, so long as it fills me, I am alive."
"The First Article of Faith says, 'The Motive Force is life.' Therefore, so long as it fills me, I am alive."
"The First Article of Faith says, 'The Motive Force is life.' Therefore, so long as it fills me, I am alive."

languages.text: "Der Erste Satz des Glaubens besagt: 'Die Antriebskraft ist das Leben.' So lange sie mich also erfüllt, bin ich am Leben."
languages.original_text: "The First Article of Faith says, 'The Motive Force is life.' Therefore, so long as it fills me, I am alive."

traits.locale_text: "Der Erste Satz des Glaubens besagt: 'Die Antriebskraft ist das Leben.' So lange sie mich also erfüllt, bin ich am Leben."

languages.text: « Il est écrit dans le premier article du Grimoire de Foi : "La Force Motrice est la vie elle-même." Ainsi, tant qu'elle sera en moi, je serai vivant. »
languages.original_text: "The First Article of Faith says, 'The Motive Force is life.' Therefore, so long as it fills me, I am alive."

traits.locale_text: « Il est écrit dans le premier article du Grimoire de Foi : "La Force Motrice est la vie elle-même." Ainsi, tant qu'elle sera en moi, je serai vivant. »

languages.text: “虔诚守则第一条就写道，‘源力即是生命。’因此，只要源力仍充盈在我体内，我就不会死去。”
languages.original_text: "The First Article of Faith says, 'The Motive Force is life.' Therefore, so long as it fills me, I am alive."

traits.locale_text: “虔诚守则第一条就写道，‘原初动力即是生命。’因此，只要原初动力仍充盈在我体内，我就不会死去。”

languages.text: 「信仰の第一節曰く『動力こそ生命』。この体が動力でみなぎる限り、俺は生きている」
languages.original_text: "The First Article of Faith says, 'The Motive Force is life.' Therefore, so long as it fills me, I am alive."

traits.locale_text: 「信仰の第一節曰く『動力こそ生命』。この体が動力でみなぎる限り、俺は生きている」

languages.text: «El Primer Artículo de la Fe dice: 'La Fuerza Motriz es la vida'. Por lo tanto, mientras me llene, estoy vivo».
languages.original_text: "The First Article of Faith says, 'The Motive Force is life.' Therefore, so long as it fills me, I am alive."

traits.locale_text: «El Primer Artículo de la Fe dice: 'La Fuerza Motriz es la vida'. Por lo tanto, mientras me llene, estoy vivo».

languages.text: "Birinci İnanç Bendi, 'Devinim Gücü hayattır.' der. Bundandır ki damarlarımda dolandığı müddetçe canlıyım."
languages.original_text: "The First Article of Faith says, 'The Motive Force is life.' Therefore, so long as it fills me, I am alive."

traits.locale_text: "Birinci İnanç Bendi, 'Devinim Gücü hayattır' der. Bundandır ki damarlarımda dolandığı müddetçe canlıyım."
